snippet: The carmaker said it would increase the number of battery-powered cars it sells and cut spending on research and development, but it will find it tough to reduce its work force.
abstract: Volkswagen reveals energetic plan to raise profits, in wake of diesel emissions scandal, by greatly increasing production of electric vehicles and cutting costs; firm, however, faces major constraints on cutting its workforce because of strength of labor representation in company, includinjg right under German law for workers to be able to veto plant closings.
lead_paragraph: The carmaker said it would increase the number of battery-powered cars it sells and cut spending on research and development, but it will find it tough to reduce its work force.

headline.main: Volkswagen Looks to Deal With Cost Problems, but Faces Constraints
headline.print_headline: Volkswagen Looks to Deal With Cost Problems, but Faces Constraints
